breakfast.title: Classic Omelette
breakfast.shortDescription: Fluffy omelette filled with your choice of ingredients.

breakfast.title: Avocado Toast
breakfast.shortDescription: Toasted bread topped with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and fresh herbs.

breakfast.title: Pancakes with Maple Syrup
breakfast.shortDescription: Fluffy pancakes served with warm maple syrup and a side of fresh berries.

breakfast.title: Grilled Salmon
breakfast.shortDescription: Freshly grilled salmon fillet served with steamed vegetables and lemon butter sauce.

breakfast.title: Mushroom Risotto
breakfast.shortDescription: Creamy risotto cooked with a variety of mushrooms and topped with Parmesan cheese.

breakfast.title: Beef Tenderloin
breakfast.shortDescription: Tender and juicy beef tenderloin steak served with mashed potatoes and red wine sauce.

lunch.title: Caesar Salad
lunch.shortDescription: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and homemade Caesar dressing.

lunch.title: Chicken Wrap
lunch.shortDescription: Grilled chicken, lettuce, tomatoes, and creamy dressing wrapped in a tortilla.

lunch.title: Quinoa Salad
lunch.shortDescription: A refreshing salad with quinoa, mixed greens, cucumbers, and tangy vinaigrette.
